Articles.Content:
Hi Folks,

It has been discussed that 0.23 will bring support to 3dconnexion devices.

I own a spaceNavigator, however I can't seem to find how to activate it within the game.

Is there a hidden option to enable (either in KSP or on the driver), or maybe a specific driver I should be using?

any input would be greatly appreciated,

10x,

Uri

-----------

Update

I've managed to get the mouse to work to change the view in the VAB (and in the 3d world) by intalling the "normal" Drivers instead of the "advanced" drivers they have available.

As for activating as flight controller, there is a switch key (default to scroll-lock) defined in the "Other" category under "Input".

Now I just need to figure out deadzones.

Leaving it for search to find by all other interested

Edited December 28, 2013 by uri_ba
